Reviews.Title: I like it but could be better the iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Paul Fils-Aime
Reviews.Content: Great phone with lots of applications but battery life neeeds improvements, does not last 8 hours of regular usage.  Hope it can improve.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great as I expected
Reviews.Author: Kas24
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 5 is a master piece, I sold my iPhone 4 to buy the iPhone 5 from this seller. The phone was new and I received it like that. Model A1429 unlocked 16gb. Many buyers complain that they bought the iPhone 5 unlocked but when reached them for use it could not work, but what worked with I got in touch with the seller and told them that I need to use the phone internationally and I was advised what model to buy and I did like wise.They sent the said model and I confirm I am using it now with problems and am enjoying the wider screen and faster processor. My browsing is faster then when used the iPhone 4.This seller gave me the right phone as advertised and was shipped in time.I there fore recommend this seller to every one who wants to buy an iPhone 5 to quickly and now contact this seller you wont be disappointed. And I will use them on other products n their profile.Their deserve 5 star.Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: it is unlocked
Reviews.Author: nads
Reviews.Content: i bought this to work in the caribbean no complains works came in great condition. will update as the time goes

Reviews.Title: Excelent phone!
Reviews.Author: Cesar Delgado Farfan
Reviews.Content: Honestly it was a Great purchase! I am very happy with my iPhone 5. it was a food price And Its delivery was very fast. I love my new phone
